net.hudup.core.logistic.ui

Class UIUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.hudup.core.logistic.ui.UIUtil

  • public final class UIUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    This utility class provides utility methods relevant to user interface (UI) such as getting image from URI, creating button, and creating menu item.
    Version:
    10.0
    Author:
    Loc Nguyen

      • getImage

        public static java.awt.Image getImage(java.lang.String imageName)
        Creating an image from image name. The directory of such image is specified by constants Constants.IMAGES_PACKAGE.
        Parameters:
        imageName - image name.
        Returns:
        image from image name.

      • makeIconButton

        public static javax.swing.JButton makeIconButton(java.lang.String iconName,
                                                 java.lang.String cmd,
                                                 java.lang.String tooltip,
                                                 java.lang.String alt,
                                                 java.awt.event.ActionListener listener)
        Creating an icon button.
        Parameters:
        iconName - icon file name. The directory of icon is specified by constants Constants.IMAGES_PACKAGE.
        cmd - action command for this button.
        tooltip - tool-tip for this button.
        alt - alternative text for this button.
        listener - action listener for this button.
        Returns:
        JButton with icon.

      • makeCheckBoxMenuItem

        public static javax.swing.JCheckBoxMenuItem makeCheckBoxMenuItem(java.lang.String iconName,
                                                                 java.lang.String text,
                                                                 java.awt.event.ActionListener listener)
        Creating a check-box menu item with icon.
        Parameters:
        iconName - icon file name. The directory of icon is specified by constants Constants.IMAGES_PACKAGE.
        text - text of menu item.
        listener - action listener for this menu item.
        Returns:
        JCheckBoxMenuItem with icon.

      • makeMenuItem

        public static javax.swing.JMenuItem makeMenuItem(java.lang.String iconName,
                                                 java.lang.String text,
                                                 java.awt.event.ActionListener listener)
        Creating a menu item with icon.
        Parameters:
        iconName - icon file name. The directory of icon is specified by constants Constants.IMAGES_PACKAGE.
        text - text of menu item.
        listener - action listener for this menu item.
        Returns:
        JMenuItem with icon.

        public static java.awt.Window getWindowForComponent(java.awt.Component comp)
        Getting the parent window Window of the specified component.
        Parameters:
        comp - specified component.
        Returns:
        Window of specified component. The method return null if the specified component has no parent Window.

        public static java.awt.Frame getFrameForComponent(java.awt.Component comp)
        Getting the parent frame Frame of the specified component.
        Parameters:

        Returns:

        Getting the parent dialog Dialog of the specified component.
